reviewText: The music in this telenovela was so great I had to buy it and music now takes me back to that awesome Telenovela!

This is was not explained properly.  Both cd and dvd are all musical numbers only.  The Novela itself is not included and was not advised of this!!!!!!!!!! I am very angry about it and now am stuck with something my mom did not care for.  The music was excellent, but, not what we wanted.

If I hadn't opened it, I could return it.  I was so excited to receive it, but when I watched it, I was so disappointed.  The video is like a home video caliber, kind of fuzzy, and too much light in places, unfocused.  It's excerpts of the telenovela, "best of", not the telenovela itself.  Not worth the price.
BEST CD AND DVD I HAVE BOUGHT YET.  LOVE THE MUSIC AND THE DVD SONGS FROM THE NOVELA.  WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THEY REALLY SING THE SONGS, OR ARE THEY SONG BY SOMEONE ELSE. LOVED IT!

The tv version of this soap opera is one of the best I've seen in many years.  I would like to buy the dvd if it is available.  I understand there are two versions, one from Mexico and the other from Columbia - Hope I can find both.  The music is lively and has lots of emotion.  In all it just great!

It says CD + DVD. What is the DVD? An abridgement of the telenovela? Like 100 episodes condensed to 1 DVD?  Subtitles?

I had to give it 3 stars since I haven't seen this product.
CD with some scratches, not to Happy.
Marvelous
Love this DVD
misleading not what I had expected
I thought it was the actual novela guess not.

It completly fulfill my expectations
Thank you very much
The last track of the CD is not recorderd properly, it has gaps of sound and jumps, and I guess that is not a song from de Telenovela. It was dissapointing.

Love having the music on cd. And being able to watch just the songs on the dvd without having to trawl through the series to see them. The interviews wIth the 3 stars were a
happy bonus.  Would have loved to have more of them.
Loved it!!!!!!!!
Lv it. I would love to get the novela also

My sister is a big fan of this Novelo. I have been hearing her talk about the great music that is associated with the show so I found this CD - DVD COMBO and ordered it for her. There are 7 sisters in the family, guess who's her favorite right now  LOL. Seriously great purchase.
I was expecting to buy the Novela.
good but not what i expected
I just love this (DVD+CD) I also love the program on TV this is the second time I watch it on TV I would like to buy the series of this wonderful program. The cast are great.
Awesome product
Cant see anything!!!

Shame on you for not being more distinct in telling customer this was only the music to the telenovella and shame on me for not reading all the reviews before I made my purchase which would have alerted me. Disappointed in my purchase but I will never buy another DVD without reading everything about it.

Very disappointed with the quality of the video..It is not worth buying... I loved the novel and was very sad at the lack  of professionalism in the recording It is my favorite but not the recording.... Hopeful some day they will produce a better copy of the full novel with the Colombian version in excellent viewing
Excellent
I couldn't play this movies on my dvd player and I return it back . I would like to get one htat will play .
Its OK.
Was not very good at all. 3/4 of the story line was missing!! There's a Mexican version that is 100x better. ( QUE BONITO AMOR )
I wish there was more La Hija del Mariachi music available.  The music is great.  The video quality is not top notch but not terrible either.  I have thoroughly enjoyed this combo pack.

Quality is terrible, I was so excited to get his novella  and I wanted to watched again with my mom because we both loved this novella, but I was very disappointed, quality is not good at all, and the first disk has lots of noise, I wish I could return it back.
The DVD did not work....I don't know if it was a unique format, or if it was defective.  The CD worked fine.
I wanted the Novela not a cd of music this said is was the dvd of the actual novela :(
Poor video quality. Not the actual novela. Not what I was expecting. Disappointed. Will more than likely return it hopefully get my money back
It's a very nice love story and the songs and the music are fantastic. I love that it has Colombian actors with Mexican actors
The CD only play in my cd player at home it does not play in my car and the DVD has no image at all just sound... Not a fun of this purchase..
It was okay. I was actually looking to receive the novela not the just the music. I was a little disappointed  also that the music was a little slower pace than in the movie.
Received my dvd and cd of all the music I love. It is so nice to have the cd to play over and over again of all the beautiful music. It is so worth it. La Hija del Mariachi (DVD + CD)
I am really enjoying the music on the cd and the viideo is great.  Will try to order the movie, it looks interesting
I loved because it reminded me of my dads time when I was very young. I was disappointed because it was not the actual novela
I love all the songs and music videos it had. Now I want the other volumes it there's anymore out there, I also want the whole collection of Mexican soap opera. La Hijack Del Mariachi..
My mother has been looking for this for over a yr. now.  I looked up Amazon and found it immediately and bought it. My mother is one happy camper
the dvd does not play either in the dvd player or the computer. My co-worker tried it at home and it did not play. the cd is fine plays well both in the car and the computer

so the DVD is a plus.  i have the entire novela with both the US/Mexico AND the Colombian endings, plus a DVD with all the songs from ebay.  totally worth every penny i paid for it.

the quality of the CD is excellent and in mp3 format.  25 songs, all beautiful.  if you've seen LHdM, but don't have it on DVD or tape, these songs will really bring back the scenes to you.

the people who gave this bad reviews are none of them too sharp.  most seem to know the novela is about 120 capitulos, yet they're either surprised it isn't, or guessing that the ONE DVD contains, the whole (not hole) novela.  that just isn't very bright.

so, for those of you who aren't the sharpest knives in the drawer, this is NOT the entire novela, it is only some special moments from plaza garibaldi.  don't buy it and then come here and give a bad review when YOU are the one who should be getting the bad review.

I watched the novela and it was the best one I have. ever seen so I just had to buy the music it is really good. All my family also loved it. My cousin told me about this novela and she was right it was the best.

I was very pleased with the sound and audio quality of the dvd. In a couple of scenes, though, the images froze for a second or two. Not sure if there was something wrong with my dvd player or a defect with the dvd. At any rate, I was satisfied with the product and look forward to many hours of musical enternainment.

For those who love the classic mariachi music, this is IT!
The singers are excellent...the music is beautiful.
Having it on CD and and DVD is a plus.
I liked this very much.
My mom is obsessed with this novela so naturally she loved this gift!
It is very good, the only thing is they did not include all the songs in the telenovela.
The person that record this did a good job.
It's not the movie
It was just the Music Videos and not the actual television show. The Music Videos were still fantastic but I just wish it said that it wasn't the show.
Excellent.
Defect in DVD
Super Musik und Videos.
Yo quiero la novela.
